note.p: Burial: Family vault at Hunsingore, Yorkshire
Career: Discovered the period and law of Algol's changes (at age 18)
References: Anita McConnell and Alison Brech, 'Nathaniel and Edward Pigott, Itinerant Astronomers' in NR 1999 vol 53 pp 305-318
T E Allibone, 'Philately and the Royal Society II' in NR 1999 vol 53 pp 107-119
Notes: Note on election certificate: Mr Goodricke never was admitted - he died soon after his election.
